item.title: Agile For Dummies : Reading experience
item.description: Agile For Dummies Here we go for the 2nd time. My 2nd book for 2015’s 10 book reading challenge is Agile For Dummies. As I wrote in my previous post I am going to avoid fiction and love stories, but focus more on technical and personal improvement books. By the time I wrote this post I was in Bangalore for software engineer internship at HealthGraph India. There we were using agile methodology (scrum) for our project.
